vscontrolcraft.ponder.basic_2.text.4: Combinational Components are components that do not have any internal state
vscontrolcraft.ponder.basic_2.text.5: They Transmits Signals Without Any Delay
vscontrolcraft.ponder.basic_2.text.7: They takes time to transit between states
vscontrolcraft.ponder.basic_2.text.8: The delay is decided by specific settings
